definition: same as 引導|引导[yin3 dao3]/Dao Yin, Daoist exercises involving breathing, stretching and self-massage
to transmit/to lead/to guide/to conduct/to direct

to draw (e.g. a bow)/to pull/to stretch sth/to extend/to lengthen/to involve or implicate in/to attract/to lead/to guide/to leave/to provide evidence or justification for/old unit of distance equal to 10 丈[zhang4], one-thirtieth of a km or 33.33 meters

pinyin: hong2 wai4 xian4 dao3 yin3 fei1 dan4

sentences.english: The analysis of the image quality on focus plate is very important in infrared seeker measurement.
sentences.chinese: 焦面上的成像質量分析是紅外導引頭測試的重要內容。

sentences.english: Interference of dual sources is an effective means of counteracting Passive Radar Seeker (PRS).
sentences.chinese: 兩點源干擾是干擾雷達導引頭的重要手段。

sentences.english: Guidance is available to you whenever you want.
sentences.chinese: 只要你需要導引對你就有用。

sentences.english: This paper discusses the direction finding characteristic of passive monopulse seeker.
sentences.chinese: 主要討論被動單脈衝導引頭對旁瓣目標的識別。

sentences.english: The wire guidance enables torpedo to close into homing contact with the target.
sentences.chinese: 有線制導能夠使魚雷接近致自導引觸及目標。

sentences.english: Operators of its secure communications system can guide friendly aircraft against enemy planes.
sentences.chinese: 其安全系統的操作者能導引友機對抗敵機。

sentences.english: Please consult the External Interfaces Guide for information on debugging MEX-files.
sentences.chinese: 請請教外部的接口針對數據的導引調試該MEX文件。

sentences.english: The aspirant must channel the fire, an unwavering commitment of intent.
sentences.chinese: 修習者需導引內力，亦即對決心毫不動搖的承諾。

sentences.english: Why does one lead to or entail the other?
sentences.chinese: 它們如何彼此導引與承繼？

sentences.english: Self-directed learning is a natural and effective learning mode for children while guided learning is formed with the instruction of the teacher.
sentences.chinese: 導引性學習是幼兒在教師引導下後天形成的學習方式。

sentences.english: The application of the electronic angle tracking technology in anti-radiation seeker was researched in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對電子角跟蹤在反輻射導引頭中的應用進行了研究。

sentences.english: All the royal cars are fitted with electronic homing devices.
sentences.chinese: 所有的皇家轎車都裝有電子自導引裝置。

sentences.english: Therefore it can be used in design of guidance law for torpedo and anti-torpedo torpedo.
sentences.chinese: 該結果可廣泛應用於魚雷及反魚雷的導引律設計。

sentences.english: Computed tomography-guided biopsy confirmed the diagnosis of synovial sarcoma.
sentences.chinese: 經過電腦斷層導引的切片檢查，確定診斷爲滑膜肉瘤。

sentences.english: The recognition process is driven by the model graph in at…
sentences.chinese: 識別由模型樹圖導引從上至下完成。

sentences.english: The limitation of over wide-band passive radar seeker is pointed.
sentences.chinese: 指出了超寬頻帶被動雷達導引頭的侷限性。

definition: to put to use/to apply/practical/applied (science, linguistics etc)/application/practical use/(computing) app
in sequence, step by step (idiom); to make steady progress incrementally
to teach/teaching and learning/education/CL:門|门[men2],個|个[ge4]
practice/to put into practice/to live up to (a promise)/to carry out (a project)
